entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:36 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -29.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peawanuck Airport 11:58 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -29.2°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -32.8°C
Wind: S 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 27.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 27. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 41 in the evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
